ow.messaging.util
クラス UPnPAddressPortMapper

java.lang.Object
  ow.messaging.util.UPnPAddressPortMapper
すべての実装されたインタフェース:
java.lang.Runnable
public final class UPnPAddressPortMapper
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.lang.Runnable

An utility class to establish a UPnP address port mapping.

メソッドの概要
static Mapping getAddedMapping()
          Returns the added address and port mapping.
static java.net.InetAddress getExternalAddress()
          Returns the external IP address of an Internet router.
static boolean isTrying()
          Returns whether this mapper is trying to set mapping or not.
 void run()
           
static void start(java.lang.String internalAddress, int port, Mapping.Protocol protocol, java.lang.String description, MessagingProvider provider, long timeout)
          Starts a mapping processes.
 
クラス java.lang.Object から継承されたメソッド
equals, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait
 

メソッドの詳細

start

public static void start(java.lang.String internalAddress,
                         int port,
                         Mapping.Protocol protocol,
                         java.lang.String description,
                         MessagingProvider provider,
                         long timeout)
Starts a mapping processes. It finishes and disappears by itself.

run

public void run()
定義:
インタフェース java.lang.Runnable 内の run

getAddedMapping

public static Mapping getAddedMapping()
Returns the added address and port mapping.

戻り値:
null if no mapping has been set.

getExternalAddress

public static java.net.InetAddress getExternalAddress()
Returns the external IP address of an Internet router.

戻り値:
null if failed to get the address.

isTrying

public static boolean isTrying()
Returns whether this mapper is trying to set mapping or not.
